statements: SELECT * FROM player_customizations;
SELECT player_id, costume FROM player_customizations;
SELECT character_skin, costume, theme_selection FROM player_customizations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_customizations WHERE character_skin = 'Ninja';
SELECT player_id, costume FROM player_customizations WHERE theme_selection = 'Dark';
SELECT player_id, character_skin, costume, theme_selection FROM player_customizations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, theme_selection, character_skin, costume FROM player_customizations WHERE theme_selection = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM player_customizations WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, costume FROM player_customizations WHERE costume LIKE '%arm%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, theme_selection FROM player_customizations WHERE character_skin = 'Robot' AND theme_selection = 'Sci-Fi' ORDER BY player_id;

SELECT player_id, character_name, costume_style FROM player_preferences JOIN player_characters ON player_preferences.character_skin = player_characters.character_name JOIN player_costumes ON player_preferences.costume = player_costumes.costume_name;
SELECT * FROM player_records WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
